alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:07AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Alameda and Contra Costa Counties through 745 AM PST... At 706 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pinole to near Newark. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, Sunnyvale, Concord, Santa Clara, Berkeley, Richmond, Antioch, San Leandro, Livermore, Mountain View, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg and Dublin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys
